revised_title: A Yearly Weather and Climate Overview of Lyndon, Rutland in 1796
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the weather and climate conditions in Lyndon, Rutland, for the year 1796. The author, Thomas Barker, records the temperature, rainfall, and barometric pressure throughout the year, noting the impact on agriculture and the environment. The text also mentions the coldest night of the winter, with temperatures dropping below zero.
